title: Uber-patch for AngularJS admin UI
description: This ticket aggregates a number of other extant tickets, providing a single patch that includes them all - see linked tickets.

comments.author: Upayavira
comments.content:
Also:


	fixes icons on core selection dropdown
	implements a better "loading" signifier
	makes cloud tab only show when in SolrCloud mode
	makes core specific tabs stay open when a core is selected
	switches analysis tab to use "chosen" for drop down
	removes unnecessary tags and fixes typo in cloud.html
	adds "core" to the logging tab (was added in non-Angular UI)



Still to do:

	port the naturalSort DIH fixes to angular
	port the cloud tab improvements to angular
	prevent DIH/etc showing a large ugly exception when not configured
	when an exception occurs (big red box at the top), hide it when user switches to a different tab
	probably quite a few little details

comments.author: Erick Erickson
comments.content: Rollup patch for the SOLR JIRAs mentioned above.
